Package ca.team4308.absolutelib.math

Class ChineseRemainderSolver.Solution

java.lang.Object
ca.team4308.absolutelib.math.ChineseRemainderSolver.Solution
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChineseRemainderSolver.CRTSolution
Enclosing class:
ChineseRemainderSolver
public static class ChineseRemainderSolver.Solution extends Object
Result of a CRT solve: the smallest non-negative solution and its period. All solutions are of the form value + k * period for any integer k.

    • Solution

      public Solution(long value, long period, List<ChineseRemainderSolver.Constraint> constraints)
      Parameters:
      value - smallest non-negative solution
      period - distance between consecutive solutions (LCM of moduli)
      constraints - the constraints this solution satisfies
